glsa.title: wv2: Integer overflow
glsa.synopsis: An integer overflow could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: wv2 is a filter library for Microsoft Word files, used in many Office suites.

description.p: A boundary checking error was found in wv2, which could lead to an integer overflow.

impact.p: An attacker could execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the program that uses the library via a maliciously crafted Microsoft Word document.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All wv2 users should update to the latest stable version:
